message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my [Product name] for $15000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the [Product name], but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $10000 for it. Looking forward to your response!

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  How about we split the difference? I'm offering the [Product name] for $12500. It's still a great price, and I'm confident you'll be very happy with it.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $11000 as my maximum offer for the [Product name]. I hope this aligns better with your expectations. Thank you for considering my proposal.
